scripts.now-deploy: if [ $TRAVIS_BRANCH == 'master' ]; then SUFFIX=''; else SUFFIX=-$TRAVIS_BRANCH; fi; now alias --token=$NOW_TOKEN $(now -t $NOW_TOKEN --name=crypto-sentimeter --regions=bru --npm --public -e NEWS_API_KEY=@news-api-key -e MONGODB_URL=@mongo-db-url -e MONGODB_NAME=crypto_sentiment) crypto-sentimeter$SUFFIX
scripts.now-scale: if [ $TRAVIS_BRANCH == 'master' ]; then SUFFIX=''; else SUFFIX=-$TRAVIS_BRANCH; fi; now scale --token=$NOW_TOKEN crypto-sentimeter$SUFFIX.now.sh bru 1 1
